bug.author: ekleiman22
bug.description: I downloaded yours TensorFlowNET.Examples and try to check all examples. In example <denchmark-link:https://github.com/SciSharp/TensorFlow.NET/issues/21>#21</denchmark-link> I get the following exception: Tensorflow.InvalidArgumentError: You must feed a value for placeholder tensor 'conv2d/ReadVariableOp/resource' with dtype resource [[{{node conv2d/ReadVariableOp/resource}}]] at Tensorflow.BaseSession._call_tf_sessionrun(KeyValuePair1 target_list) at Tensorflow.BaseSession._do_run(List1 fetch_list, Dictionary3 fetches, FeedItem[] feed_dict) at TensorFlowNET.Examples.CnnTextClassification.Train() in C:\Users\eug10\source\repos\SciSharp-Stack-Examples-master\src\TensorFlowNET.Examples\TextProcessing\CnnTextClassification.cs:line 230 at TensorFlowNET.Examples.CnnTextClassification.Run() in C:\Users\eug10\source\repos\SciSharp-Stack-Examples-master\src\TensorFlowNET.Examples\TextProcessing\CnnTextClassification.cs:line 75 at TensorFlowNET.Examples.Program.RunExamples(String key, IExample[] examples) in C:\Users\eug10\source\repos\SciSharp-Stack-Examples-master\src\TensorFlowNET.Examples\Program.cs:line 87
